EST. 1992

About Me

I'm Alex Martinez, a UX/UI designer and front-end developer based in a Washington, D.C. I am part of the design team at ISL where I work on web and mobile applications.

Originally born and bred in the heart of it all (Ohio), I moved to D.C. after attending Ohio University in May of 2014. I'm driven by the goal of crafting the best digital products possible.

When I'm not at a computer, I spend my time running, cooking, and traveling. I also love a good burrito, French Bulldogs, and baby pandas.

This site is an ongoing work in project, built in Jekyll and hosted on Github . Type is set in Inconsolata, Aktiv Grotesk, and Athelas.

© Alex Martinez 2015. Made with ♥ in and around DC, OH
